page.title: 19HOUSING IN NORTON.
page.content: Norton is a small village and consequently there are not many housing developments. The style of the houses themselves also varies considerably. The majority of the houses in Norton have been built over the last hundred years. They are a mixture of semi- detached and detached. The detached houses are very large with long drives and large gardens. In addition to these houses there are a few houses which are several hundred years old. These are either former farm houses or worker's cottages and have become a natural part of the countryside. At the moment there are no plans for a modern housing estate in Norton as all the available land is currently used for arable and dairy farming.
